mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (postNumber, categoryNumber, userNumber, postName, adminPost, contents, createTime, suggestionCount, views) VALUES (#{postNumber}, #{categoryNumber}, #{userNumber}, #{postName}, #{adminPost}, #{contents}, #{createTime}, #{suggestionCount}, #{views})
mapper.select: SELECT rankId, postNumber, views, suggestionCount, createTime FROM rank_posts ORDER BY suggestionCount DESC, views DESC, createTime asc LIMIT 10
mapper.update: INSERT INTO rank_posts (postNumber, views, suggestionCount, createTime) SELECT postNumber, views, suggestionCount, createTime FROM posts
